name: tendency_of_sea_water_alkalinity_expressed_as_mole_equivalent_due_to_biological_processes
description: The phrase "tendency_of_X" means derivative of X with respect to time. sea_water_alkalinity_expressed_as_mole_equivalent is the total alkalinity equivalent concentration (including carbonate, nitrogen, silicate, and borate components). The specification of a physical process by the phrase "due_to_" process means that the quantity named is a single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity named by omitting the phrase.
